name: Client Interfaces Product Manager
description:
Dostavista.global (Borzo) is one of the biggest and most technologically advanced players in the global same-day delivery market. We provide unparalleled convenience to businesses and people, all the while creating millions of self-managed courier jobs, and strive to make delivery easier and cheaper than getting out of one’s house or office.

We operate in ten countries across Asia, Latin America, and Europe and deliver more than 3 500 000 parcels monthly. To remain at the forefront of this promising, often surprising yet already highly competitive market, we aim to provide our clients with a stellar interface experience. We are looking for a UX ambassador whose passion for elegant and efficient interface solutions will drive it to perfection and make clients love us for our attention to their needs.

Your mission

As the Client Interfaces Product Manager, you will take charge of the platform and cross-platform client experience and drive client interfaces to perfection using data analysis, customer research, and your vision while supporting other teams that launch features with interface presence.

You won't do it alone: we have a perfectly fitted team of researchers, analysts, and product designers who will support you along the way. The engineering team is also dedicated — only you are missing!

Expected outcomes

  • You have removed any interface obstacles that hinder the product value and achieved significant improvements in key product metrics with UX changes
  • You have made platform and cross-platform interface experience seamless and consistent
  • You have put us a step ahead of the competition in interface usability
  • You have put together a system of UX and interface-related metrics that would allow us to assess interface performance
  • You have established a continuous feedback loop to uncover interface issues and identify opportunities
  • You have proven to be the client UX expert and platform owner whose opinion is taken into account across the company

Requirements

  • Track record of successful development of products that heavily rely on web and app interfaces to deliver product value
  • Experience in tight collaboration with product designers, UX-researchers, and analysts
  • Experience in AB-testing
  • Ability to analyze data on your own using SQL, Tableau, Firebase, Amplitude, and GA
  • Experience in interface prototyping
  • Experience in designing and running moderated and unmoderated usability testing
  • Excellence at system analysis and writing detailed tasks for development

Would be awesome if you:

  • Strive to solve complex problems with elegant solutions
  • Understand the value of UX
  • Enjoy teamwork
  • Love getting dirty in research, analytics, and prototyping

What we offer

  • 100% Remote work or office in Moscow or in any other one of our 10 countries
  • Opportunity to work with a big global team
  • Common sense is in our DNA
  • Horizontal structure without strict subordination and bureaucracy
  • Chance to build global breakthrough products in delivery
  • Competitive salary and comprehensive health-care with dental insurance
  • Education: own library, paid courses and conferences
  • Recreation: PS4, Nintendo Switch, Board games, office quizzes, holiday parties
